Dynamic Graphics

This page is to gather some resources on dynamic graphics.

Software

name description image
GGobi GGobi is a statistical software tool used for graphing various types of data. GGobi allows extensive exploration of the data with dynamic graphics. It is also a tool for looking at multivariate data. R (programming language) can be used in sync with GGobi. GGobi prides itself on its ability to link multiple graphs together. GGboi

Web-based Interactivity in Statistics

name description image
GASP The Globally Accessible Statistical Procedures initiative is designed to make statistical routines easily available via the WWW. The routines currently available have been divided into two categories, data analysis and educational.
